summary: Racism collides with corporate greed when nine strangers - one of whom has a bomb - become trapped in a Wall Street elevator.
cast: Christopher Backus|Anita Briem|John Getz|Shirley Knight|Michael Mercurio|Amanda Pace|Rachel Pace|Devin Ratray|Joey Slotnick|Tehmina Sunny|Waleed Zuaiter|Gary Ambrosia|Luis Jose Lopez|Narbe Mansourian|Daniel Berge Halvorsen|Herbert Russell|Donna Lynne Shoplock|Johannes Alfvén|Kitty Kreidler|Stephen Wozniak|Anthony Backman|Christie Campagna|Denny Dormody|Tony Gorodeckas|Heather Howe|Michael Leopardi|Tom Riordan|Benedicte Westbye|Tor Arne Øvrebø
keywords: trapped|claustrophobia|killed in an elevator|trapped in an elevator|racism
title: Elevator
